name: Depths of the void
description:
This was a entry for the 8th Alakajam game Jam.

The whole project was completed over the course of 48 hours. While there are many things I would love to add, I am happy overall with how this turned out. 

The game supports controller, or keyboard. 

Controller - Left thumbstick to move, A(X) to jump, and X(square) to interact

Keyboard - WASD or Arrows to move, space to jump, E to interact

Hope you enjoy and I would appreciate any feedback
